entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WindowsBase NETCoreApp vs WindowsDesktopApp #30953
  • [MAC/Windows]After installing .NET 8.0 Preview 2, Create a 7.0/6.0 Blazor WebAssembly app with a warning: "warning NU1603: DebugBlazorApp4 depends on Microsoft.NET.ILLink.Tasks (>= 7.0.100-1.23062.2) but Microsoft.NET.ILLink.Tasks 7.0.100-1.23062.2 was not found..." #30949
  • Regression - NET8 Preview1 SDK won't publish trimmed self contained solution with netstandard2.1 projects #30948

Closed

  • Automatically create a local tool-manifest when a tool is installed and no manifest exists #27736

PullRequests

Created

  • Add new line to C# item templates with file-scoped namespaces #30955
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30952
    Area-Infrastructure
  • GenAPI: Add unsafe keyword if the calls of the base constructor is unsafe #30950
    Area-GenAPI

Merged

  • Update triggers for 8.0 #30956
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [gh-23135] use parent path of manifest file path as rootConfigDirectory #24935
    Area-CLI

Updated

  • Add support for new output path format #29599
  • [GenAPI] add new keyword to return types #30932
    Area-GenAPI
  • Introduce `Workload Clean`: Garbage Collection Component #30266
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2125487 #30714
    Area-Infrastructure
